DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to determine the effects of creatine monohydrate or vitamin D supplementation on strength gains following a traditional resistance training program for adults with spinal cord injury.
DOC.brief_title: Creatine or Vitamin D Supplementation in Persons With Spinal Cord Injury Undergoing Resistance Training
DOC.criteria: Spinal cord injury Minimum time since injury: 3 months Participation in resistance training programmes in the previous 6 months Creatine or vitamin D supplementation in the previous 6 months
